Aikhenvald .Description .This book explores the variety of types of complementation found across the languages of the world and their grammatical properties and meanings .It shows how languages differ in the grammatical properties of complement clauses and in the types of verbs which take them , and explores the complement strategies deployed by languages which lack a complement clause construction .
